item.title: Terraform Role Assignment Fails on Azure — Fixed with Correct RBAC & Automation
item.description: Terraform often fails when assigning roles in Azure due to RBAC permission issues. Here’s how I fixed this in a CI/CD pipeline using the right roles and automation.

item.title: Terraform Destroy Fails in Azure Due to Resource Dependencies
item.description: Running terraform destroy in Azure sometimes fails due to implicit resource dependencies. Here’s how I resolved a common NSG and subnet dependency issue and ensured clean teardown.

item.title: Terraform State Corruption in Azure — Recovered
item.description: Faced a corrupted Terraform state file in Azure Blob Storage? Here’s a real-world recovery guide to restore infrastructure state safely in 4 simple steps.

item.title: Azure DevOps pipeline stuck on 'Initialize job' Step-by-step fix
item.description: Fix Azure DevOps pipeline hangs at 'Initialize job' phase. Complete checklist with real root causes and fixes from production.

item.title: Azure DevOps Pipeline Timeout – Fixing Long-Running Build Failures
item.description:
Does your build or deployment fail after 60 minutes? You might be hitting a default timeout on Azure Pipelines.

Error Message

[error]The job was canceled after reaching the timeout limit of 60 minutes.

Default Limits

  • Microsoft-hosted agents: 60 minutes per job (can be increased)
  • Self-hosted agents: You control the timeout

Increase Timeout in YAML

Add the timeoutInMinutes setting to your job:

jobs:
- job: Build
  timeoutInMinutes: 120
  pool:
    vmImage: 'ubuntu-latest'
  steps:
    - script: echo "Building..."

Optimize the Build

  • Avoid long dependency installations (e.g., move to cache or Docker layer)
  • Parallelize jobs using strategy and matrix
  • Use restoreCache and saveCache for npm, pip, Maven, etc.

Use Self-Hosted Agent (No Hard Timeout)

Set up a self-hosted agent in Azure VM or AKS to avoid limits altogether.

item.title: Azure Application Gateway 502 Error – Full Troubleshooting Guide for Beginners
item.description: Step-by-step guide to troubleshoot and fix 502 errors on Azure Application Gateway. Easy enough for Beginners, clear enough for production.

item.title: AKS Node Disk Pressure
item.description: A production issue in Azure AKS where nodes ran into DiskPressure. Here's how we investigated, fixed, and prevented it in the future.
